title: An Organ-aware Diagnosis Framework for Radiology Report Generation
details: S Li, P Qiao, L Wang, M Ning, L Yuan, Y Zheng, J Chen - IEEE Transactions on …, 2024
abstract: Radiology report generation (RRG) is crucial to save the valuable time of radiologists in drafting the report, therefore increasing their work efficiency. Compared to typical methods that directly transfer image captioning technologies to RRG, our approach …
